html:
Today we announced new features for Google Slides, making it easier to create visually stunning presentations. Here’s what’s new:

  • Workspace recently announced that they’re now using Imagen 3, our latest image generation model.
  • You’ll find the design features you need in the new sidebar on the right side of your canvas.
  • Our library of new templates covers everything from planning to pitching.
  • We’re bringing building blocks to Slides so you can spend less time editing by using pre-designed, fully editable components like key stats, agendas, quotes and more.
  • Access millions of high-quality stock images, web images, GIFs and more from an expanded stock library.
  • Proportional scaling now allows you to select a group of objects or text in a slide and adjust sizing while preserving image clarity.

Check out the Workspace blog for all the details.
